creator: jmaz@mycosmos.gr
text:
I have recently installed nstealth security center (www.nstalker.com) and i 
scanned my web server for possible vulnerabilities. 
The report from the program showed me that i have a denial of service 
vulnerability. The report is as follows:

Risk Level: High
Location: http://<my_ip_address>/(...).

Denial-of-Service Vulnerability - Possible bug or misconfiguration problem in 
the web server that allow unauthorized remote users to launch denial-of-service 
attacks, rendering the machine temporarily unusable.

Since this is a message from nstalker, I think you'll need to ask them
what they are talking about.  I have no idea what they are refering to.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: slive@apache.org
